ProductInfo.title: Apple iPhone X, Fully Unlocked 5.8", 256 GB - Silver
ProductInfo.ProductSpecs: {"Item model number": "A1865-256-Silver", "ASIN": "B075QLRSPK", "Shipping Weight": "15.5 ounces (View shipping rates and policies)", "Product Dimensions": "5.7 x 0.3 x 2.8 inches", "Item Weight": "5.6 ounces", "Batteries": "1 Lithium ion batteries required."}

ManufDetails_row1.data1:
OLED Designed for iPhone X
The first OLED screen that rises to the standards of iPhone, with accurate, stunning colors, true blacks, high brightness, and a 1,000,000 to 1 contrast ratio.
Improved Cameras
A larger and faster 12MP sensor. A new color filter. Deeper pixels. And a new telephoto camera with OIS.
The wide-angle and telephoto cameras on iPhone X enable optical zoom, as well as digital zoom of up to 10x for photos and 6x for videos.
Face ID
Face ID is enabled by the TrueDepth camera and is simple to set up. It projects and analyzes more than 30,000 invisible dots to create a precise depth map of your face.

ManufDetails_row2.data2:
["", "", "", "", "", "", "Front and Back Glass
 

 The front and back are all glass — the most durable we’ve ever made, with a strengthening layer that’s 50% deeper. A seven-layer ink process allows for precise hues and opacity, and a reflective optical layer enhances the colors. And an oleophobic coating lets you easily wipe off smudges and fingerprints.", "Front and Back Glass
 

 The front and back are all glass — the most durable we’ve ever made, with a strengthening layer that’s 50% deeper. A seven-layer ink process allows for precise hues and opacity, and a reflective optical layer enhances the colors. And an oleophobic coating lets you easily wipe off smudges and fingerprints.", "Front and Back Glass", "The front and back are all glass — the most durable we’ve ever made, with a strengthening layer that’s 50% deeper. A seven-layer ink process allows for precise hues and opacity, and a reflective optical layer enhances the colors. And an oleophobic coating lets you easily wipe off smudges and fingerprints.", "Wireless charging for a wireless world
 

 We’ve always intended iPhone to be a truly wireless device, free from charging cables and headphone cords. With a glass back and an embedded wireless charging system, iPhone X is designed for a wireless future.", "Wireless charging for a wireless world

 iPhone X is precision-engineered at the microscopic level to protect against water, splashes, and dust.", "Water and Dust Resistance
